org.pioto.radiothermostat.api

Interface ThermostatTime

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<ThermostatTime>, Serializable

    public interface ThermostatTime
extends Serializable, Comparable<ThermostatTime>
    Interface representing the time, as tracked by the thermostat.

    The thermostat only tracks the day of the week, and the current hour/minute of the day.

    Author:
    Mike Kelly (pioto@pioto.org)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DayOfWeek getDay()
      The day of the week this time represents.
      Integer getHour()
      The hour of the day this time represents, in hours since midnight.
      Integer getMinutes()
      The number of minutes past the hour for this time.

        The hour of the day this time represents, in hours since midnight. (e.g. 0 = "12 AM", 13 = "1PM")
